item.description: It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they are doing!We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.Technical Project Manager :Technical Project Manager at Fractal.ai Bengaluru Company overview Fractal is a strategic AI and analytics partner to the most admired Fortune 500 companies globally, helping them power every human decision in the enterprise at scale by bringing AI, Engineering and Design together.
